price: Por kur Ai u dha atyre nga dhuntitë e Veta, ata u bënë koprracë dhe kthyen shpinën, duke u larguar.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
